thread.title: Budge World - Kids Games, Creativity and Learning - Budge Studios
thread.title_full: Budge World - Kids Games, Creativity and Learning - Budge Studios

title: Budge World - Kids Games, Creativity and Learning - Budge Studios
text:
Opening the iTunes Store. If iTunes doesn't open, click the iTunes application icon in your Dock or on your Windows desktop. Progress Indicator Opening the iBooks Store. If iBooks doesn't open, click the iBooks app in your Dock. Progress Indicator iTunes iTunes is the world's easiest way to organize and add to your digital media collection. We are unable to find iTunes on your computer. To download the free app Budge World - Kids Games, Creativity and Learning by Budge Studios, get iTunes now. 
Already have iTunes? Click I Have iTunes to open it now. Budge World - Kids Games, Creativity and Learning By Budge Studios 
Open iTunes to buy and download apps. Description Budge World™ brings access to all the most popular kids characters in one amazing app! Kids will enjoy tons of activities that emphasize creativity, learning and fun!EXCITING GAMES FEATURING AWARD WINNING BRANDS INCLUDING:• Barbie • Thomas & Friends • Strawberry Shortcake • Caillou • Hello Kitty • Crayola • Monster High • The Smurfs • Garfield • Care Bears • Miss HollywoodPLAY - CREATE – DISCOVER:-TOP KIDS BRANDS – Each brand has its own portal filled with activities-NEW CONTENT CONSTANTLY – Get access to new themed lands, new characters to collect, games, learning activities, and more!-INSPIRE LEARNING – Practice spelling and counting in a fun and engaging way.-EARN & COLLECT – Collect new characters and customize your world with prizes, stickers and more!No ads or in-app purchases for subscribersSUBSCRIPTION DETAILSBudge World is a subscription service. Subscription to the app gives full access to all the content of the app for as long as the subscription is active. New content added monthly for subscribers. Some content only becomes available as kids progress in the game, such as prizes, stickers and new Budge characters.-Payment will be charged to your iTunes account when you confirm your purchase-Auto-Renew may be turned off at anytime by going to the Account Settings-Users may be offered a free trial of the subscription in accordance with banners inside the app. Users will need to opt-in to a subscription in order to accept the trial period and have the right to opt-out at any time during the trial period. Users will be automatically charged after the trial period if they haven’t opted out.-Like all other Apple subscription apps, Budge World cannot use family sharing to share subscriptions across family members-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period-No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period-If you have any questions or need help, please contact our Customer Support at support@budgestudios.caPRIVACY AND SAFETYBudge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws, including the Child Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA), a privacy legislation in the United States of America. If you would like to learn more on what information we collect and how we use it, please visit our privacy policy at: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/privacy-policy/ . If you have any questions, email our Privacy Officer at: privacy@budgestudios.ca.END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENTThis application is subject to an End-User License Agreement available through the following link: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal-embed/eula/Before you download this app, please note that this app is free to try, but additional content is only available to subscribed users. BUDGE STUDIOS, BUDGE and BUDGE WORLD are trademarks of Budge Studios Inc. All other trademarks featured in this app are the property of their respective owners and used under license by Budge Studios Inc.BUDGE WORLD © 2016 Budge Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved.
